data.value: Your E-Mail and Password are deprived of the new encryption method, re-create the profile as soon as possible.

data.name: bugligapple2332ezwinbusurumevanilyacort
data.value: Choose your "Minecraft Vanilla" version. These versions are the stock versions of Minecraft, and you cannot add mods later. You can use Fabric or Forge to use mods.

data.value: There must be a special directory in your profile for this!

data.name: delerr
data.value: You must have more than 1 profile to delete a profile!

data.value: Press Yes to indicate that you have read and understood this text and that you want to continue with the program, press No to reject it.

data.name: fabricdir
data.value: You cannot install "Fabric" without a special directory!

data.name: ffupdating
data.value: You are using an old version of FFGapple. The new version is being downloaded and will be installed.

data.name: fillerr
data.value: Fill in the red marked places!

data.name: forgeerr
data.value: Notification: Since the owners of Forge Minecraft do not want the Forge installation to be automated, automatic Forge installation is disabled, we have prepared the Forge installation environment for you, to download: https://files.minecraftforge.net/net/minecraftforge/forge/

data.name: fresh
data.value: Do You Want To Do Fresh Install?

data.name: ipinf
data.value: FFGapple Launcher aims to improve user experience and enhance service quality. IP addresses can be stored anonymously in memory. This is not done to track users or store personal data, but solely to limit excessive load or misuse. IP addresses are temporarily stored in memory, and user privacy is highly safeguarded. FFGapple Launcher doesn't share collected IP addresses with third parties or use them for commercial purposes. To proceed, confirm your understanding and click the "Ok" button to continue or the "Reject" button to decline and exit the program.

data.name: legal
data.value:
Welcome to FFGapple Launcher. Before you begin, there are some things you need to review.
FFGapple Minecraft Launcher Copyright (C) 2023 / ffgapple
This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.
This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details.
You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this program. If not, see https://www.gnu.org/licenses/.
FFGapple Launcher is an open-source Minecraft launcher. It is not affiliated with Microsoft or Mojang. FFGapple Launcher and its developers are not responsible for any possible issues arising from included libraries and installation packages. Any action that does not comply with the GNU General Public License is illegal and may result in legal action.

data.value: This optimization tool looks for the amount of memory in your system and allocates enough memory for the game.

data.name: pc
data.value: Parental controls ensure your children stay safe online. Your child can use the FFGapple Launcher within the limits you set.

data.value: You need to first select the profile you want to edit!

data.name: selver
data.value: Game Cannot Be Started, Select A Version For Start The Game!

data.name: setname
data.value: Exit After The Starting To Game:

data.name: skinok
data.value: The "Skin" package has been created successfully, you can use the package you created by selecting the "Custom Skin Pack" package in the game to apply it.

data.name: startfail
data.value: FFGapple Cannot Start The Game, Please Check Your FireWall. If Your System OK, Contact From GitHub.

data.name: suredel
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete the profile named {0}? This action cannot be undone!

data.name: temelayar
data.value: Basic settings have been changed. Please restart to apply the changes.

data.name: tip
data.value: FFGapple is an open source Minecraft Launcher developed by a high school student since 2021. If you want to contribute to me, you can choose the donation amount you want from the buttons below and contribute to me!

data.name: uop
data.value: Operating System Is Not Supporting By FFGapple!

data.name: uperr
data.value: The new version cannot be installed. We will address this issue.

data.name: upwont
data.value: A new update has been found, but it cannot be installed because automatic updates are turned off!

data.name: user1
data.value:
Welcome to FFGapple, the open source, free, fast Minecraft Launcher!
You can log in with Mojang by entering your Microsoft & Mojang e-mail and password with the green field, if you don't have an account, you don't have to worry! From the red area, you can enter the game with the nickname you want by pressing the Offline login button!

data.name: user2
data.value:
This is the Main Menu for Profile System Logins,
You can add as many profiles as you want from the Green Zone point.
You can delete the profile you selected from the blue area dot.
You can edit the profile you have chosen from the point with the purple area.
You can refresh the profile list from the dot with the orange area.
You can select a profile from the point with the red area.
You can start playing the game right from the point with the yellow area!

data.name: user3
data.value:
What is adding a profile?
The FFGapple Profile system is a technology that allows you to quickly log into the game without wasting your time. With the settings you set, you can quickly open the game and enjoy!
FFGapple will automatically detect the native language on your computer and translate all texts into your native language, no extra action!

data.name: user4
data.value:
What is profile editing?
You can change your profile settings as you wish. FFGapple will translate texts into your native language.

data.name: user5
data.value:
Settings menu
You can access this menu by right click and settings.
Here you can customize FFGapple according to you. You are free, as you wish :)!

data.name: user6
data.value:
Thanks for using FFGapple,
There is so much more to discover, what are you waiting for. Shall we start the adventure :) ?

data.name: verno
data.value: FFGapple Cannot Get The Version List!

data.name: w87
data.value: Windows 7 are supported by FFGapple 3.9. Would you like to use this version?

data.name: w8err
data.value: On Windows 8.1, FFGapple may not work as expected.

data.name: webview
data.value: There are some files required for FFGapple to work, without them FFGapple cannot work. Do you approve the download? File: WebView2 From Microsoft

data.name: xmlerr
data.value: XML Files Damaged, Failed to Copy. The Program Goes To Repair Mode.
